title: I AM DISTROUGHT, I DREW RED PORO SHIRT

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body: i am in need of red poro sweatshirt, for i have the money but now the shirt is gone. i am distrought and i want to buy sweater, pls rito, i must have.

replies.body:
It looks like we're all a bit out of luck, since that [**red poro sweater**](https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/holiday-poro-sweatshirt-limited-edition-red-unisex.html) has already been retired. It's most likely the red was just way more popular than the blue and they ran out of stock rather quickly.

I'd hate for that sweet drawing to goto waste though. If you ever need a small amount of RP to get you to your next skin or other purchase, hit us back up with that drawing and we can make a trade ^_^
A+ for effort xD is beautiful drawing <3
You really sold the distraught emotion. I too missed out.
can we get this person rp equal to the value of the sweater???????????????
